sourcesContent:
import { motion } from 'framer-motion' import React from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Col, Container, Row } from 'reactstrap' import products from '../assets/data/products' import Helmet from '../components/Helmet/helmet' import CommonSection from '../components/UI/CommonSection' import '../styles/product-details.css' const ProductDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() const product =products.find(item=> item.id === id) const {imgUrl, productName, price, avgRating, reviews, description,shortDesc } = product return

{productName}

({avgRating} ratings)

£{price}

{shortDesc}

Add to Cart
Description
Reviews ({reviews.length})

{description}
} export default ProductDetails
